[[/collapsible]]

**Subject:** ProcyonLotor aka Corvus

**Commentary:** ProcyonLotor is currently one of the moderators of the wiki and under the moniker Corvus he is also chat staff. Once you know that Procyon lotor is the scientific name for raccoons and Corvus is the Latin word for raven, you should get why I chose to include these animals. The wavy bar in the bottom is derived from the symbol Corvus has in front of his name in the user list of #site19 (at least in my client).

**How the prompt fits in:** This prompt has got to be the most specfic one that there is this year. It doesn't leave much room for interpretation, but fortunately I didn't need that anyway, as you can see.
